typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cust_id as string,
		cust_name as string,
		location as string,
		pin_code as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadCSVFile
source(output(
		uid as integer,
		cust_id as string,
		location as string,
		pin_code as integer,
		most_recent_ind as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
ReadCSVFile derive(most_recent_ind = 'Y') ~> AddNewColumn
source1 select(mapColumn(
		TS_uid = uid,
		TS_cust_id = cust_id,
		TS_location = location,
		TS_pin_code = pin_code,
		TS_most_recent_ind = most_recent_ind
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ReadCSVFile, Select1 lookup(cust_id == TS_cust_id,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
AddNewColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkInsert
